org.agreement_technologies.common.map_grounding

Interface GroundedTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroundedTaskImp

    public interface GroundedTask
extends java.io.Serializable
    Grounded planning task.
    Since:
    1.0

      • getSelfInterestLevel

        double getSelfInterestLevel()
        Returns the level of self-interest of the agent. The self-interest is a number from 0 to 1, where 0 means fully coopertive and 1 means fully self-interested.
        Returns:
        Self-interest level
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMetricThreshold

        double getMetricThreshold()
        Gets the metric threshold. This threshold indicates the minimum metric value for the agent to accept a plan as a solution.
        Returns:
        Metric threshold
        Since:
        1.0

      • metricRequiresMakespan

        boolean metricRequiresMakespan()
        Indicates if the metric function contains the total-time keyword, i.e. that tries to optimize the makespan.
        Returns:
        true, if the metric includes the total-time as a parameter; false, otherwise
        Since:
        1.0

      • evaluateMetric

        double evaluateMetric(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> state,
                    double makespan)
        Evaluates the metric function in a given state.
        Parameters:
        state - State
        makespan - Makespan of the plan
        Returns:
        Metric function value
        Since:
        1.0

      • evaluateMetricMulti

        double evaluateMetricMulti(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> state,
                         double makespan)
        Evaluates the metric function in a given state.
        Parameters:
        state - Multi-state (it is a state where a variable can have several values)
        makespan - Makespan of the plan
        Returns:
        Metric function value
        Since:
        1.0

        double getViolatedCost(int prefIndex)

        Parameters:
        prefIndex - Preference index (in [0,getNumPreferences()-1])
        Returns:
        Violation cost
        Since:
        1.0

      • negationByFailure

        boolean negationByFailure()
        Checks if the used model is negation by failure.
        Returns:
        true, if the model type is negation by failure; false is the model is unknown by failure
        Since:
        1.0
